moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Appa
characters.description: oversized flying bison, big and fluffy--did I mention he was large?

moves.name: Big Sigh
moves.description: Appa sighs, creating a gust of wind

moves.name: Giant Sneeze
moves.description: Appa sneezes, covering his opponent in gross snot

moves.name: Giant Stomp
moves.description: Appa stomps on his opponent with his large oversized bison feet

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: Appa lets out a frightening roar that knocks his opponent off their feet

new moves.name: Giant Sneeze
new moves.description: Aang sneezes, covering his opponent in his snot
